name: Path-o-Maniac
description:
A game made by Anagh's World for Trijam #115: The 3 hour game jam

Plot

It's 1960s, the world is Black and White. Our little friend 'Golu' has lost his way back home. Help him reach his destination.

Theme - Drag and Drop

The game uses "Drag and Drop" mechanics that are used to drag and drop the blocks.

Overview

"Path-o-Maniac" is a drag and drop puzzle game where you build a proper path using the blocks provided and help 'Golu' reach his home.

Controls

The controls are super simple. LMB (for PC) or Touch (for Mobile) to drag and drop the elements and obviously to click the buttons.

Credits

  • Concept, Design & Programming
    • Anagh's World - using Godot 3.2.3
  • Graphics
    • Anagh's World
  • Music
    • Anagh's World & 3xBlast@opengameart.org

Dev Comments

  • The game difficulty is kept at minimum so that everyone can play and enjoy the game.
  • There is also a hack in the game which makes it easy to complete some of the levels much faster and using less blocks. If you find it, then please let me know in the comments. But please don't tell what the hack was, so that other's can also enjoy finding it :)
